name: LesserKnown Works and Authors Quiz | Authors and their Works | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'The Mayor of Casterbridge' is one of the novels written by this author.
questions.explanation:
Thomas Hardy.

	It's not one of his most famous, but it's good reading.

questions.text: 'The Idiot' is also a lesser known work by a prominent author.
questions.explanation:
Fyodor Dostoevsky.

	After 'Crime and Punishment' and 'Brothers Karamazov', people struggle to remember other works.

questions.text: 'Tortilla Flat' was written by this American author.
questions.explanation:
John Steinbeck.

	They made a movie out of it.

questions.text: 'Dodsworth' also was written by an American author.
questions.explanation:
Sinclair Lewis.

	Better known for 'Arrowsmith' and 'Main Street'

questions.text: 'Barnaby Rudge' is the product of a prolific writer.
questions.explanation:
Charles Dickens.

	How many did Dickens write?

questions.text: Who is the author of the 'Tarzan' stories?
questions.explanation:
Edgar Rice Burroughs.

	Allen did 'Anthony Adverse'.

Lew Wallace.

	Agee did 'A Death in the Family'.

questions.text: Who wrote 'The Bridge of San Luis Rey'?
questions.explanation:
Thornton Wilder.

	He is better known for 'Our Town'.

Mark Twain.

	It wasn't just Tom and Huck.

Nordhoff and Hall.

	Along with 'Pitcairn island', this was part of the 'Mutiny on the Bounty' trilogy.
